_header: O sinful man into this mortal sea
_description: Robert Henryson, ‘The Thre Deid Pollis’ — eight 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc)

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
O Synfull man in to þis mortall seyQuhilk is þe well and
                    of murning and of cair…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…The sone alswa þe holy gaist condigneThre knit in ane be
                    perfyte vnite

Banna.First Lines:
O sinfull man in to this mortall sequhilk is the vaill of mvrnyng
                    and of Cair…
Banna.Last Lines:
…The sone alswa The haly gaist condingThre knit in ane be
                    perfyt vnitie
